title: Wear Coin Toss
summary: Use an ancient roman coin to decide your fate. Optimized for the Android Wear!
developerAddress:
1767 E Deer Canyon Lane
Draper, UT 84020
description: A simple Coin Toss application optimized for the Android Wear devices.  Does run on phones and other devices as well.Install notes:-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.Android Wear Instructions-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Coin Toss" or say "Start Coin Toss".-Swipe to the right to close.-Any other swipe or touch to re-toss.
descriptionHTML:
A simple Coin Toss application optimized for the Android Wear devices. Does run on phones and other devices as well.

Install notes:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.

Android Wear Instructions
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Coin Toss" or say "Start Coin Toss".
-Swipe to the right to close.
-Any other swipe or touch to re-toss.
comments: Simple and elegant! Great little app - I often go to toss a coin and find I don't have one. This solves that problem. Graphics are beautiful, which pleases my inclinations towards pretty and historic things. And it's a lovely way to show off my new moto 360. :-)
